title: Renewable Energy Certificate (REC) Purchase
description: A corporate sustainability officer needs to purchase RECs to cover their company's annual electricity consumption and meet their 100% renewable goal.

tasks.description: Calculate the total MWh of electricity the company consumed in the last calendar year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the company needs to purchase 50,000 RECs.

tasks.description: Query REC trading platforms for available Green-e certified wind and solar RECs and their prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of available REC bundles and their current market prices.

tasks.description: Execute a purchase for 50,000 solar RECs from a specific vintage year.
Ensure the purchased RECs are formally 'retired' on behalf of the company in the appropriate registry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the retirement of the RECs and obtains a certificate.
